body: Actually I think there's a memory leak here. It sets `tresult` to `NULL`, but it was obtained as a result of `newWithTensor`. Could you please add a `free` here?
body_html: Actually I think there's a memory leak here. It sets tresult to NULL, but it was obtained as a result of newWithTensor. Could you please add a free here?
